content: PWH SD CMT Self-drilling cement screws Exterior single cement board screw (kaitex duplex coating) for fastening cement boards to metal ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Screws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easy to drive thanks to excellent drilling characteristics Hilti has full control of the manufacturing process – delivering reliable, consistent quality Precisely matched to Hilti drivers and bits – helping to achieve high-quality fastenings every time All Hilti drill-point screws meet or exceed ASTM C 954 performance requirements Low contact pressure – for more comfortable, less tiring screwdriving Applications Fastening cement boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) Fastening exterior sheathing boards to metal studs (20-14 ga) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Screw head type: Wafer head Screw drive/recess type: PH #2 Collated: No Technical Data | Screw head type | Wafer head | Screw drive/recess type | PH #2 | Collated | No | Product Class | Standard | Drilling capacity - min (ga) | 20 ga | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution ### ITEMS- 372759 - Cement brd screw 8 x 1-1/4 PWH SD - Package Size 5000 pc - 372760 - Cement brd screw 8 x 1-5/8 PWH SD - Package Size 4000 pc
